attributes.action: Bring back the child A&E and maternity units back to Southport Hospital.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The childrens A&E department and maternity units have been closed at Southport Hospital and moved to Ormskirk hospital. The traffic from Southport to Ormskirk is horrendous at normal times and gridlocked at peak times including bank holidays. Children have been born on road sides through being stuck in traffic and it wont be long before a child dies. Southport has all the facilities needed, it has more residents than Ormskirk and plenty more roads in to the hospital.
The services were taken away to cut costs and we want them back.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bring back the child A&E and maternity units back to Southport Hospital."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16895
